sourceMeaningMnemonic: Super <radical>poop</radical> is a super <radical>power</radical> you have in <kanji>infancy</kanji>. Those in infancy have the power to poop at will, whenever and wherever they please. Infancy poop power!
meaningInfo:
Infants poop a lot. There's poop everywhere. The powerful aroma overwhelms you. Eww.

Also refers to childhood, when you still have some of your poop powers, but they're already starting to go away.
readingMnemonic: In <kanji>infancy</kanji>, one eats a lot of soft foods, such as <reading>yo</reading>gurt (<ja>よう</ja>). Yogurt is the food item above all others that grants superior pooping power.
readingInfo: See this infant gobbling up all the yogurt he can get his grubby little hands on. Soon, he begins to poop all over the place. Hear the infant screaming, "Goo-goo! Yogurt poop power! I'm a baby! Wahhhh!!"
